642:1: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunirmañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
642:2: ye te mañjuśrīḥ ! tvayā nirdiṣṭā sattvā teṣāmarthāya idaṃ paṭavidhānaṃ visaramākhyātam |
642:5: taṃ śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru bhāṣiṣye |
642:8: sādhu sādhu bhagavan ! subhāṣitā te'smadvibhāvanodyotanakarīṃ mantracaryāguṇaniṣpattiprabhāvanakarīṃ vārṇām |
642:12: atha bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sarvāvantaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya smitamakārṣīt |
642:13: atha bhagavataḥ śākyamunirmukhadvārāt nīlapītasphaṭikavarṇādayo raśmayo niścaranti sma |
642:14: samanantaraniścaritā ca raśmayo sarvāvantaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalaṃ avabhāsya trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ sarvamārabhavanaṃ jihmīkṛtya sarvanakṣatradyotiśailagaṇaprabhāṃ yatremau candrasūryau mahardhikau mahānubhāvau tayā prabhayā te'pi jihmīkṛtau nāvabhāsyante,
642:16: na virocante jihmīkṛtāni ca saṃdṛśyante sarvamaṇimantraupadhiratnaprabhāṃ niḥprabhīkṛtya punareva bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ mukhadvārāntardhīyate sma ||
642:17: atha khalu vajrapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tatraiva parṣanmaṇḍale sannipatito'bhūt sanniṣaṇṇaḥ |
642:18: sa utthāyāsanāt sattvaramāṇarūpo bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya bhagavantametadavocat – nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
642:26: yo idaṃ sūtrendrarājaṃ mañjuśrīmūlakalpā vidyācaryānuṣṭhānakarmasādhanopayikasamavaśaraṇadharmameghāniḥśritaṃ samanupraveśānuvartakaṃ kariṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti śraddhāsyanti pustakalikhitaṃ kṛtvāḥ pūjayiṣyanti vandanacūrṇānulepanadhūpamālyaiḥ chatradhvajapatākaiḥ vividhairvā prakārairvādyaviśeṣairvā nānātūryatāḍāvacaraiḥ |
642:27: antaśaḥ anumodanāsahagataṃ vā cittasantatirvā pratialapsyante romaharṣaṇaṃ sañjanaṃ vā kariṣyanti vidyāprabhāvaśaktiṃ vā śrutvā saṃhṛṣyante anumodiṣyante caryāṃ vā pratipatsyante |
642:28: vyākṛtāste mayā anuttarāyāṃ samyak sambodho sarve te bhaviṣyanti |
642:30: ata eva jināḥ smitaṃ kurvanti nānyathā iti ||
642:31: ādau tāvad dṛṣṭasamayaḥ kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ labdhābhiṣekaḥ asmin kalparājamūlamantrahṛdayaṃ upahṛdayaṃ vā anyataraṃ vā mantraṃ gṛhītvā ekākṣaraṃ vā anyaṃ vā yathepsitaṃ mahāraṇyaṃ gatvā triṃśallakṣāṇi jape phalodakāhāraḥ mūlaparṇabhakṣo vā kṛtapuraścaraṇo bhavati ||
642:32: tato parvatāyamabhiruhya jyeṣṭhaṃ paṭaṃ paścānmukhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya,
642:33: ātmanā pūrvābhimukho kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ śvetapadmānāṃ śvetakuṅkumābhyaktānāṃ lakṣamekaṃ bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ paṭasyādhastānnivedayet |
642:37: tato'rdharātrakālasamaye śuklapūrṇamāsyāṃ prātihārakapratipūrṇāyāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ agnikuṇḍaṃ kṛtvā padmākāraṃ śvetacandanakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya kuṅkumakarpūraṃ caikīkṛtya,
642:40: tataḥ bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ raśmayo niścaranti samantācca paṭaḥ ekajvālībhūto bhavati |
642:41: tataḥ sādhakena sattvaramāṇarūpeṇa paṭaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya sarvabuddhabodhisattvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ praṇamya paṭaṃ grahītavyam ||
642:45: yatrāsau bhagavāṃ saṅkusumitarājendrastathāgataḥ tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati āryamañjuśriyaṃ ca sākṣāt paśyati dharmaṃ śṛṇoti anekānyapi bodhisattvaśatasahasrā paśyati tāṃśca paryupāste mahākalpasahasraṃ ajarāmaralīlī bhavati |
642:46: paṭastatraiva tiṣṭhati sarvabuddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhito bhavati teṣāṃ cādhiṣṭhānaṃ sañjānīte kṣetraśatasahasraṃ cākrāmati kāyaśatasahasraṃ vā darśayati anekaṛddhiprabhāvasamudgato bhavati āryamañjuśriyaśca kalyāṇamitro bhavati niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇo bhavatīti ||
